page.title: 21Mawdesley Village Hall: progress report
page.content:
In the 25 years since the last report, the village hall has continued to be a very successful social amenity.

An ongoing program of maintenance and development has given Mawdesley possibly one of the best Village Halls in the county. Currently a project is under way to install Solar Panels to provide the hall with 'green' electricity. More information about the hall is available from the hall's website.


Contribution by: Ray Scully
